quest.name: A Taste of Honey
journal: The amiable maiden appears suddenly concerned.

dialogue.name: EMPLOYEE03287
dialogue.text: I will never leave my lady's side again!

dialogue.name: LADY03287
dialogue.text: All this talk of relying on the bonded, and I haven't given a thought as to what your duties might be. I hope I haven't interrupted your work unduly?

dialogue.name: LADY03287
dialogue.text: A tour of the city, is it? Then you really must visit the Beehive─it's always buzzing with activity! Ahem, local humor...

dialogue.name: LADY03287
dialogue.text: Anyway, a lady by the name of Tista-Bie usually has her seat near the entrance. She will gladly speak with you on any number of topics, assuming you find yourself on her good side!

dialogue.name: LADY03287
dialogue.text: I think you will find the Beehive is far more diverting than watching me pick out new curtains for the parlor!

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: Welcome to the Beehive, my little drone. Seeking the sting of excitement to liven up your day?

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: ...Hm hm, I can tell at a glance when folk are new to our happy colony. It's the nervous fluttering, you see─always gives them away.

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: Why don't we play some cards to set you at your ease, eh? A quick game of “High or Low”─it's simply a matter of guessing who has the bigger hand.

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: If you win, I'll grant you a single favor...within reason, of course. Interested?

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: Ready for a game of “High or Low”, then?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Let's play!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Maybe another time.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: What are the rules?

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: “High or Low” is a guessing game. You must decide whether the total of your three cards is higher or lower than the total of your opponent's cards.

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: The deck holds nine cards, with the pictures printed thereon representing the numbers one through nine. Each number appears only once in the deck, so there are no repeats.

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: If you guess correctly, then you win the match. If both totals are the same, then another hand is dealt.

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: Oh? Well, you know where to find me if you want to play a hand or two.

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: Good for you! No time like the present, I say!

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: Three cards for you, three cards for me. You flip one of yours over, and I flip two of mine.

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: Now, what's your call? Will your total be higher or lower than mine?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: I call...

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: ...low!

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: ...high!

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: You're going with “low,” then? Right, let's see what we've got...

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: You're going with “high,” then? Right, let's see what we've got...

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: My cards add up to [#1]. And you have...

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: ...a total of [#1].

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: Congratulations, your guess was right!

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: Hm... Usually I'd concede defeat at this point, but what do you say to a rematch? One more win, then we'll talk about that favor.

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: Aw... Sorry, honeybee, but this match goes to me.

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: Shall we play again?

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: That's what I like to hear. Let me shuffle the deck...

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: Had enough for now? Fine, fine─I'll be sitting right here should the mood strike you.

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: Oho, it seems we came out equal. But as lovely a coincidence as that may be, we still need a clear winner...

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: Another match of “High or Low”? Come now, little honeybee, we all need our diversions.

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: That's the spirit! Let me sort out the deck...

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: Well, well, would you look at that. I think you've got a knack for this, newcomer.

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: Congratulations! Victory is yours...as is the prize I promised.

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: Oh dear, looks like this match goes to me.

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: Come whisper in my ear, then, and don't be shy. Tell ol' Tista what she can do for you.

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: ...That's all? How delightfully wholesome. But if knowledge is what you want, then that is what you shall have.

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: In my humble estimation, the most wondrous thing about this town is how safe we are from the sin eaters.

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: They say Lord Vauthry was born with the power to command them─which means no Eulmoran need ever raise a weapon in defense of the city.

dialogue.name: TISTABIE
dialogue.text: ...Was that the kind of thing you wished to know? If your itch still needs scratching, you might get a few words out of Atharn over there. There's naught that merry sot likes more than the sound of his own voice.

dialogue.name: ATHARN
dialogue.text: Whassat? New to Eulmore, you say?

dialogue.name: ATHARN
dialogue.text: Gahaha! Only just arrived and already you're looking to peel away the layers of mystery. Oh, I'm all for chatting, but you need to slow down and enjoy life, my friend!

dialogue.name: ATHARN
dialogue.text: I tell you what: you hop up on stage and give us a dance first, and then we can have our little talk!

dialogue.name: ATHARN
dialogue.text: Go on, there's plenty of room up there! Give us your best shimmies and shakes!

dialogue.name: ATHARN
dialogue.text: (-Atharn-)That's the way! Dance like there's no tomorrow!

dialogue.name: ATHARN
dialogue.text: <whistle> Now that was a show! You're welcome to clamber up on stage any time you like!

dialogue.name: ATHARN
dialogue.text: So...what was it you wanted to ask me? Ah, yes, something about our fair city. Well, I can tell you it wasn't always so peaceful as it is today.

dialogue.name: ATHARN
dialogue.text: The Eulmoran Army may be the very essence of military might, but even our forces saw grievous losses in the war against the sin eaters.

dialogue.name: ATHARN
dialogue.text: Things changed for us, oh, around twenty years ago now, when the old ruler's son came to power!

dialogue.name: ATHARN
dialogue.text: He's got this way with the eaters, you see─turns them docile as house cats. I wouldn't be exaggerating to say they've become something of an ally to Eulmore. No longer an enemy to be feared.

dialogue.name: ATHARN
dialogue.text: And yet elsewhere, there are still fools who insist on fighting their losing battles... Pah! A toast to Lord Vauthry!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You've gained a preliminary sense of the city. The Chais─and Alphinaud─will be expecting your return.

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: Hm...? Ah, yes, the assistant. Was there something?

dialogue.name: DULIACHAI
dialogue.text: Oh, you've returned from your jaunt around the city? So soon?

dialogue.name: DULIACHAI
dialogue.text: You needn't have hurried back─young Alphinaud has yet to put brush to canvas.

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: One cannot rush good art, I'm told. Or good artists, apparently...

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: ...Ah, finally.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I've put together an ensemble out of the garments you chose. Is this satisfactory?

dialogue.name: DULIACHAI
dialogue.text: Oh, goodness gracious me! That last outfit was precious, but this makes you look positively dashing!

dialogue.name: DULIACHAI
dialogue.text: You truly are a handsome boy! However am I to decide!?

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: What happened to painting?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: I don't recall this part of the artistic process...

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: Exactly! The lad is an artist, dearest, not a dress-up doll. It's about time we set him to work for the reason we called him here!

dialogue.name: DULIACHAI
dialogue.text: ...Must we? I do love a good painting, but I thought since we were enjoying ourselves so thoroughly...

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: Well, I'd not─ That is to say, as long as you...

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: Ugh. Just...make sure you give the lad time to prepare. We know who'll be upset if he's not ready to paint at a moment's notice.

dialogue.name: DULIACHAI
dialogue.text: Whatever you say, darling. So! Shall we pick out some jewelry, next!?
